metadata.title: CVE-2014-9621 on Ubuntu 14.04 LTS (trusty) - low
metadata.description:
The ELF parser in file 5.16 through 5.21 allows remote attackers to cause adenial of service via a long string.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2014-9621` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

file - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.4
libmagic1 - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.4
python-magic - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.4
python3-magic - 1:5.14-2ubuntu3.4
No subscription required

criterions.comment: file package in trusty was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '1:5.14-2ubuntu3.4').
